about_the_game:
Horny Punishment is a adventure game. Our character is a powerful darklord who conquered the world for ages. After years of terror, this powerful darklord vanishes with no explanation. Some time passes before he re-emerges as a farmer, but dark creatures from newcomers trying to become the new great darklord are disturbing his peace. It's time to punish all those who came in his way!
In this game you will explore a lot of maps and find puzzles.
Meet charming NPCs.
PUNISH ALL YOUR ENEMIES!
This game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy life, with a lot of hentai scenes and challenges.

  • -Nudity or sexual content
  • -All scenes within the game are consensual
  • -24 unique H-Scenes
  • -Explore 3 different regions
  • -5 Side Quests to complete
  • -Not suitable for playing at work
  • -Not suitable for all ages
  • -All characters in the game are over 18 years old
